## CardsReader.onCardRemoved property

An event handler for the [CardRemoved](./devices.cardremoved.md) event. This is a unicast subscription, i.e. only one handler can be registered at once.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onCardRemoved: Handler<CardRemoved>;
```
